channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Indigo De Souza & Mothé – “Serious”
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the dreamy vibes of Indigo De Souza and Mothé's new track "Serious"! 🌟 #NewMusicAlert #DreamyDuo

item.title: Dancehall – “Modern Age”
item.description: 🌟 Get ready to groove to the fresh beats of Dancehall's latest track, "Modern Age"! 🎶💃 #NewMusic #FeelTheVibe

item.title: Surprise: Butthole Surfers Reunite for First Performance in Eight Years
item.description: 🎉 The Butthole Surfers are back for a wild ride! 🤘 Who's ready to rock out with these legends? #ButtholeSurfersReunion 🎸🔥

item.title: Neil Young, Lana Del Rey, Beck to Play Harvest Moon Charity Concert
item.description: 🌾✨ Music legends unite for a good cause! 🎶 Get ready for a night of pure magic at the Harvest Moon Charity Concert! 🌟 #MusicForACause

item.title: Lucy Dacus and Young Miko Are Joining Billie Eilish on the ‘Hit Me Hard and Soft’ Tour
item.description: 🎵 Exciting news alert! Lucy Dacus and Young Miko are hitting the road with Billie Eilish on the 'Hit Me Hard and Soft' Tour! 🚀 #MusicNews #TourVibes
